company.tagline: The best way to code with AI
company.description: Cursor is built to make you extraordinarily productive, providing a range of AI-powered coding assistance tools. It integrates with platforms like GitHub and Slack to enhance the software development workflow and promotes efficient programming practices.

events.title: Introducing Cursor for Enterprise
events.description: Cursor is used by tens of thousands of enterprises, including Salesforce, NVIDIA, and PwC, to accelerate product velocity and build durable software.

events.title: Cloud Agents
events.description: Cloud agents make it easy to run many agents at once, without requiring your laptop to stay connected to the internet.

events.title: Composer: Building a fast frontier model with RL
events.description: Composer is our new agent model designed for software engineering intelligence and speed.

events.title: Introducing Cursor 2.0 and Composer
events.description: A new interface and our first coding model, both purpose-built for working with agents.

events.title: Introducing Plan Mode
events.description: Cursor can now create plans, research your codebase, and run agents for significantly longer.

events.title: Improving Java support in Cursor
events.description: Weâ€™re speeding up the Java Language Server Protocol (LSP) and VS Code ecosystem.

events.title: Improving Cursor Tab with online RL
events.description: Our new Tab model makes 21% fewer suggestions while having 28% higher accept rate.

events.title: 1.5x faster MoE training with custom MXFP8 kernels
events.description: Achieving a 3.5x MoE layer speedup with a complete rebuild for Blackwell GPUs.

events.title: Bringing the Cursor Agent to Linear
events.description: You can now trigger Cursor Background Agents directly from Linear, helping you fix bugs, build features, and respond quickly to user feedback.

events.title: Updates to Teams and Auto
events.description: Variable requests for teams and competitive pricing for Auto.
